abstract: daily deal : your favorite beauty brands are 50 % off at ulta .
article: * ulta 's `` love your skin '' event * hundreds of products on sale for up to 50 % off * shop one-day deals and week-long sales as wellwho says beauty products have to be expensive ? some of the biggest beauty brands are on sale right now during ulta 's `` love your skin '' event . the deals work two ways : certain products are on flash sale , priced at 50 % off for one day only . other deals last through the weekend , ending on january 27 . either way , you 'll want to shop fast , because these best-selling products are typically never this cheap .

here are just a few of the must-have items we spotted . 1 . $ 8 julep triple quench deep hydration sheet masksthis is the next generation of face masks that everyone is trying . it 's an easy to use , three-step hydrating at-home facial -- in one packet . and it promises softer , brighter , plumper-looking skin in just 15 minutes . step 1 : prep the skin with an essence ampoule gel . step 2 : get your nutrients by putting on the bio-cellulose gel sheet mask . step 3 : seal in all the goodness with a sleeping pack , applying a thin layer of cream to your face to pat it all down .

regularly $ 12 , get this new face mask on sale for just $ 8.2 . 50 % off skyn iceland hydro cool firming eye gelswhen you 're run down and stressed out , the delicate skin under your eyes really takes a beating , resulting in puffiness and premature wrinkling . that 's why men and women have taken to skyn iceland 's hydro cool firming eye gels , a cooling gel patch that infuses the eye area with icelandic glacial waters and ingredients that de-puff , tone and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles . 100 % vegan and cruelty-free , the patch is easy to apply and you only have to leave it on for ten minutes to start seeing results .

regularly $ 30 , this 8-pack of eye gel patches is now just $ 15 . one-day only . 3 . 50 % off proactiv deep cleansing washproactiv 's gentle all-over cleanser works for your face and body , clearing acne blemishes on the body and unclogging pores to clear and help prevent whiteheads , blackheads , and future breakouts . you already know about this brand , beloved by both teens and adults alike , and boasting celeb spokespeople like justin bieber and julianne hough . regularly $ 35 , the cleansing wash is on sale for just $ 17.50 .

one-day only . 4 . 40 % off strivectin tightening & sculpting face creamthis best-selling face cream plumps , lifts and firms the appearance of skin to sculpt and redefine the most flattering angles on your face . the nourishing formula strengthens your skin 's moisture barrier for deeply hydrated , replenished and supple skin . regularly $ 95 , it 's on sale for just $ 57.50 until the end of the weekend . 5 . $ 30 off dr. brandt needles no more expression line smootherthis popular product is a topical cream that mimics anti-wrinkle treatments to visibly relax and smooth the look of expression lines and wrinkles -- without needles .

the cream helps your face to further relax over time , creating the appearance of smoother skin . this wrinkle relaxing cream targets lines and wrinkles on forehead , between brows , and crow 's feet . regularly $ 89 , it 's now on sale for $ 59.99 . this one sells out fast so get it while you can . related storiesthe 10 best-selling skincare products on amazon from 2017grab this pack of dry shampoo wipes to fix oily hair on the goeverlasting love : 6 kiss-proof lipsticks for valentines day .
